alert.note: Alert for Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 11:35AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jones and northwestern Onslow Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1134 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Catherine Lake, or near New River Station, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Half Moon, Richlands, Verona, Catherine Lake, Petersburg, Richlands South and Haws Run. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
